name: Doodle Jump Journey
description:
'Doodle Jump Journey' is a platformer video game made for the Nintendo DS. It was published by GameMill Entertainment on October 29th, 2013. It is based on the digital iOS and Android versions, which were both released in 2009.

The video game features a stout, green alien-like creature that the player controls, who must ascend the several levels with the help of nearby platforms. Watch out for deteriorating tiles though, for if you hop on one, you run the chance of plummeting to the bottom!

With the same addictive gameplay as its originators, watch out for flying enemies who will try to hinder your progress (which you can either shoot or suck up using your snout), and keep an eye out for springs and propellers to leap ahead towards the end of the level- or to test how far you can really go!
